message.content:
<<<api>>>: Collections.shuffle, ArrayAdapter.getItem, ArrayAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged
<<<code>>>: addExercise.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
            @Override
            public void onClick(View v) {
                Collections.shuffle(listItems);
                String randomElement = adapter.getItem(0);
                adapter.clear();
                adapter.add(randomElement);
                adapter.notifyDataSetChanged();
            }
        });
<<<explanation>>>: In the onClickListener for the addExercise button, we first shuffle the listItems array using Collections.shuffle. Then, we get the first element from the shuffled array using adapter.getItem(0). We clear the adapter using adapter.clear() and add the random element to the adapter using adapter.add(randomElement). Finally, we call adapter.notifyDataSetChanged() to update the ListView with the new data.
